TopicTitle: Don't come home until you visit every planet! [Stock mission plan]

Articles.Content:
I've started a new vanilla game, and I'm going to take the heroes on an epic journey to every planet in the Kerbal system. Jebediah will land on every single one, (except bop and Gilly due to bugs) and eventually return home.

Put the original three in a transfer ship (The Firebird) in orbit around Kerbin.

Put a one-man Dunian lander (The Iron Lizard) with transfer and ascent stages in orbit around Kerbin.

Put a one-man Iketian lander (The Tree Frog) with transfer stage in orbit around Kerbin

Transfer all three ships to duna.

Perform Aerocapture with The Firebird and The Iron Lizard, Perform Aerobrake-assisted Iketian capture with The Tree Frog.

Rendezvous the Firebird with the Iron Lizard.

Leave the pilot of the Iron lizard in Dunian Orbit, and EVA Jeb into the Iron Lizard.

Land Jeb and explore the surface.

Ascend when the firebird is overhead, and rendezvous with it.

When close, burn prograde until relative velocity is about 10 m/s. Turn retrograde, burn full throttle, and jump out. (this maneuver will henceforth be referred to as "ditch the ship")

Use the firebird to match velocity with Jeb if needed, and get Jeb into it.

Transfer the Firebird to Iketian Orbit and rendezvous with the Tree Frog.

Leave the Tree Frog's pilot in Iketian orbit.

Put jeb in the Tree Frog, land and explore the surface

Design a new 3 man transfer ship (The Darkwing Duck) and send it to Duna, with one pilot.

When it gets there perform aero-assisted iketian capture.

Have Jeb ascend from Ike and rendezvous with the Firebird

Ditch the Tree Frog and get in the Fire Bird.

Rendezvous the Firebird with the Darkwing Duck.

EVA the original three into the darkwing duck, and it's original pilot into the Firebird.

---- this is how far I've gotten ----

Put the original three on a transfer trajectory to Jool using the Darkwing Duck.

Collect the two orbiting Kerbals in the Dunian system with the Firebird.

Put the firebird on a transfer trajectory to Kerbin.

Design and test a three-man SSTO spaceplane (The Handy Man)

Put three of them in orbit, one pilot each.

When the firebird arrives, perform aerocapture and rendezvous with one of the handy men. (the firebird has no chutes)

EVA two of the firebird's Kerbonauts over to the Handy Man.

Land the full Handy Man at the KSC runway. Have a welcome home party with cake.

Rendezvous the firebird with another Handy Man.

Ditch the firebird and EVA the final pilot into the Handy Man. (Don't land with this handy man yet)

Design a small hovering observational craft for Bop, with a generous transfer stage.

Design a heavy one-man no-atmo lander for Tylo, with a two-stage landing engine, and a two-stage accent vehicle.

Design a lander for Vall, with ascent stage.

Design an orbital spaceplane to land on Laythe. It needs drop tanks, and a final rocket stage which decouples the plane parts.

Design another generous transfer ship.

Design a support crew rescue ship capable of transferring back to Kerbin.

Send these new toys out to Jool.

When the Darkwing Duck arrives at Jool, perform aerocapture with the intent of an apoapsis near bop. Don't bother circularizing.

Warp and dodge moons until in a good position to transfer to bop, get there somehow and circularize in a polar orbit.

While warping be careful not to miss the mid course correction events for each of the ships in transit.

As each one arrives perform Joolian aerocapture and transfer to the moon it was designed for. The transfer ship goes to Laythe and the rescue ship to bop.

-- Joolian adventure to be filled out in detail --

After visiting all the moons of Jool

Transfer the support crew rescue ship and the Darkwing duck (both full of rescue crew) to kerbin.

Land all rescue crew at KSC with Handy Man spaceplanes.

Transfer the original three to Kerbin and attempt to perform a gravitational assist (with plenty of course corrections) into a Mohonian transfer trajectory.

If there is not enough fuel, do an aerocapture and rendezvous with a new ship.

Send a 1-man RCS lander to moho, a three man support crew return ship, and a new hero transfer ship.

Perform powered orbit capture with all three ships.

....

to be continued....
